show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #5, Ariel Greenwood "Relearning the ancestral approach to land management"
subtitle: #5, Ariel Greenwood "Relearning the ancestral approach to land management"
summary:
Ariel Greenwood joined us to talk about her journey from North Carolina to California and points beyond. She talks about the crash course she had in the disparity between intention and results.
